thread.title: Anna Nicole Smith Show's Producer in 'Behind Closed Doors' Clip: Working With Her Took 'Amazing Patience'
thread.title_full: Anna Nicole Smith Show's Producer in 'Behind Closed Doors' Clip: Working With Her Took 'Amazing Patience'

title: Anna Nicole Smith Show's Producer in 'Behind Closed Doors' Clip: Working With Her Took 'Amazing Patience'
text:
PHOTOS: Celebrity Kids Who Became Models 
Fox points out that the show's team had to be ready to roll with the punches. "Anna Nicole was probably the most unpredictable reality star I've ever worked with â€” which made it really fun, [but] also difficult to produce," he says. "There were several occasions where she would just change her mind at the last moment, and [there] was nothing we could do about it." 
Watch the clip above. Anna Nicole Smith: Behind Closed Doors airs on Reelz Saturday, February 4, at 9 p.m. ET.
